links.*: Of the Ordering of the Shire

wikitext.*:
A '''Shire-moot''' was a gathering of [[Hobbits]] summoned by the [[Thain]] of the Shire, who was also the master of the Shire-moot. By the end of the [[Third Age]] a Shire-moot was only held in times of emergency.<ref>{{FR|Ordering}}</ref>
